mapper.insert: insert into t_sales (name, price, progress, lasttime, successtime, custid, userid, custname, username) values (#{name}, #{price}, #{progress}, #{lasttime}, #{successtime}, #{custid}, #{userid}, #{custname}, #{username})
mapper.update: update t_sales set progress=#{progress}, lasttime=#{lasttime}, successtime=#{successtime} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_sales WHERE custid=#{custid} order by id desc
select count(*) from t_sales WHERE date(successtime) >= #{start} and date(successtime) <= #{end} and progress=#{state}
select sum(price) from t_sales WHERE date(successtime) >= #{start} and date(successtime) <= #{end} and progress=#{state}
